TopicTitle: (suggestion) kerbal head bob in first person / IVA

Articles.Content:
its just a little detail  to use once first person or IVA is in the game 

have your camera bob with the head while walking, flying , landing  and etc 
 

and if people wouldn't like this setting on they could

click a little button in the settings to turn it off or have  a slider to change how much head bob there is
